our_mission_description: Our mission is to help those in need by providing support in various areas.
our_mission_text: Since 2014, we have been helping new immigrants, distributing food baskets and shopping cards. New and second-hand clothes, support in finding a job, training (English/computers), subsidizing emotional treatments for children.
our_team_text: Our team consists of dedicated professionals and volunteers who work tirelessly to provide support and care to those in need.
get_involved_text: Join us and make a difference. Whether you want to volunteer, donate, or support us in other ways, your help is invaluable.

need_help: Need help? Want to consult? We're here for you.
